description.failure_item: State is off
description.text: "The Log Inspection module captures and analyzes system logs to provide audit evidence for PCI DSS or internal requirements that your organization may have."

description.failure_item: Severity clipping agent event send syslog level min
description.text:
"Send Deep Security Agent and Deep Security Virtual Appliance events to
 syslog when they equal or exceed the following severity level: This
 should typically be changed when a syslog server isused. This setting
 determines which event triggered by those rules is sent to the syslog
 server (if syslog is enabled). (Page 54 - DSBPG)"

description.failure_item: Severity clipping agent event store level min
description.text: "Store events at the Deep Security Agent and Deep Security Virtual Appliance for later retrieval by Deep Security Manager when they equal or exceed the following severity level: This setting determines which log inspection events are kept in the database and displayed on the log inspection events screen. Custom rules can be made to monitor logs that are not in the included set of rules. (Page 54 - DSBPG)"

description.failure_item: State is off
description.text: "It's necessary to activate firewall module for controlling incoming and outgoing traffic."

description.failure_item: State is off
description.text: "It's necessary to activate firewall module for controlling incoming and outgoing traffic."

description.failure_item: Severity clipping agent event send syslog level min
description.text:
"Send Deep Security Agent and Deep Security Virtual Appliance events to
 syslog when they equal or exceed the following severity level: This
 should typically be changed when a syslog server isused. This setting
 determines which event triggered by those rules is sent to the syslog
 server (if syslog is enabled). (Page 54 - DSBPG)"

description.failure_item: Severity clipping agent event store level min
description.text: "Store events at the Deep Security Agent and Deep Security Virtual Appliance for later retrieval by Deep Security Manager when they equal or exceed the following severity level: This setting determines which log inspection events are kept in the database and displayed on the log inspection events screen. Custom rules can be made to monitor logs that are not in the included set of rules. (Page 54 - DSBPG)"
